sect3.title: Description
sect3.para:
The NT_MU function (MÃ¶bius mu function) returns 0 if @n is divisible by the square of a prime . Otherwise it returns:
-1 if n has an odd number of different prime factors.
1 if n has an even number of different prime factors.
If n=1 it returns 1

sect3.para: For an example about nt_mu, see
